init.title: Home Control Settings
init.description: This integration will provide a dashboard which will be used for your Home Control App on your watch .

data.config_text: Choose one of the following dashboards:

error.no_dashboards: No dashboards found. Create at least one Lovelace dashboard.
error.view_registration_failed: Failed to register HomeControl HTTP view.
error.dashboard_not_found: The requested dashboard was not found.
error.dashboard_not_allowed: You are not allowed to access the requested dashboard.
